product_name: Baffin Zip Soft-Shell Trail Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Zippered closures on the women's Baffin Zip Soft-Shell shoes make these warm, waterproof shoes quick to slip on for that walk to the mailbox or to the ski hill from the parking lot. Zipper-closure polyester soft-shell uppers are waterproof and breathable. Polyester microfiber linings are soft and moisture wicking for all-day comfort. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushioning to keep feet comfortable. Reflective hits for low-light visibility. Rubber outsoles grip the ground for sure footing. Closeout.
short_description: Zippered closures on the women's Baffin Zip Soft-Shell shoes make these warm, waterproof shoes quick to slip on for that walk to the mailbox or to the ski hill from the parking lot.
